definition[0]: in a steady way, without stopping and starting again
definition[1]: if a planned event, piece of work etc goes smoothly, there are no problems to spoil it
example[1]: It’ll take about three hours if everything goes smoothly.
example[2]: Donna keeps the office running smoothly.
definition[2]: if you say something smoothly, you say it in a calm and confident way
example[3]: ‘All taken care of, ’ he said smoothly.
definition[3]: in a way that produces a smooth surface
example[4]: The jacket fit smoothly over her hips.
